m_szDocTitle: Tesla Motors (TSLA) Stock Falling Today on Slowing U.S. Demand - TheStreet
m_szDocSumamry: TheStreet Tesla Motors (TSLA) Stock Falling Today on Slowing U.S. Demand By Sebastian Silva | 10/27/14 - 03:54 PM EDT Reprint NEW YORK ( TheStreet ) -- Shares of Tesla Motors Inc. ( TSLA - Get Report ) are down 5.6% to $222.06 after data from Ward's Auto shows slowing Model S demand in the U.S. The electric car company is struggling with slowing demand for its flagship Model S vehicles, tabulating a 26.3% year-to-year drop in unit sales for Tesla during September, David E. Zoia, editorial director of Ward's Auto, told TheStreet.com. Separately, Tesla announced a new leasing policy that would c
